amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the EPA Buildings and Facilities account by $10 million and increase funding for the Diesel Emissions Reduction Act (DERA) by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Buildings and Facilities account by $10 million and increase the State and Tribal Assistance Grants account by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 232 (Roll no. 662).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 232 (Roll no. 662).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Ms. Richardson.
